summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Resolution Notes (Notas de Resolução) feature. All backend API tests passed (9/9). Frontend E2E tests verified: modal appears when changing status to Concluído, resolution notes are saved and displayed correctly, cancel functionality works properly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code implementation is solid - Case model correctly includes solution, solved_by, solved_by_id fields
CaseUpdate model properly accepts resolution fields
Frontend CaseDetails.jsx correctly handles the resolution modal flow
data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ResolutionNotes_* test cases during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Resolution Notes feature is fully functional. Backend API accepts solution, solved_by, solved_by_id fields on PUT /api/cases/{id}. Frontend shows resolution modal when status changes to Concluído, and displays resolution notes section on completed cases.

features_tested.modal_appears_on_status_change: PASSED - Modal appears when changing status to Concluído
features_tested.resolution_fields_saved: PASSED - solution, solved_by, solved_by_id are saved correctly
features_tested.resolution_section_displayed: PASSED - Green section with resolution notes appears on completed cases
features_tested.cancel_preserves_status: PASSED - Canceling modal does not change case status
features_tested.api_accepts_resolution_fields: PASSED - PUT /api/cases/{id} accepts all resolution fields
